equipment.name: Sovereign Vambraces
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +20.25% Chance to Slow
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>44.56%</text> Attack Speed.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>36.92%</text> increased damage to its primary target per lanced enemy.

equipment.name: Band
base_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> grant <text class='c_random'>28.5</text> Essence.

equipment.name: Boneweave Faulds
base_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>37.72%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

equipment.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
base_affixes: When you pick up <text class='c_random'>9.8</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text>, a free <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes:
Gain <text class='c_random'>36.67%</text> increased damage to a set of damage types for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> seconds.  This effect alternates between <text class='c_number'>2</text> sets: 
<li>Fire, Lightning, and Physical. 
<li>Cold, Poison, and Shadow.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>29.99%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>59.98%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Dragon Spine
strikethrough_affixes: Attacking enemies with a <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skill increases the damage of your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill cast by <text class='c_random'>11.2%</text>, up to <text class='c_number'>42%</text>.
+29.4% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>63.89%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +12.32% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites

equipment.name: Amulet
base_affixes: +(0.8+0.6*2) Rank of the Tides of Blood Passive
strikethrough_affixes: You deal <text class='c_random'>59.86%</text> increased Shadow damage to enemies afflicted by both <text class='c_important'>Decrepify</text> and <text class='c_important'>Iron Maiden</text>.
added_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>61.57%</text> of normal damage.

equipment.name: Archon Greaves
base_affixes: Critical Strikes grant <text class='c_random'>8.33%</text> Movement Speed for <text class='c_number'>1</text> second, up to <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.
+19% Movement Speed for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite

equipment.name: Doom Casque
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> triggers <text class='c_important'>Corpse Explosion</text> on surrounding Corpses. When <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by <text class='c_random'>0.44</text> seconds.
+5.6% Lucky Hit Chance while You Have a Barrier
